metadata.title: CVE-2018-5124 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
Unsanitized output in the browser UI leaves HTML tags in place and canresult in arbitrary code execution in Firefox before version 58.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5124` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '59.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
